thread.title: John Agnew
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by John Agnew

author: John Agnew
title: John Agnew
text: From the time I entered your store I was fascinated by the service, Nadia showered me so many selections of mattresses that I was overwhelmed by the the time I decided what I wanted I was befuddled. Then based on her experience she introduced me Moe and he and was so patient and caring. I look forward to buying my living room selection from you in the near future. Thanks sincerely John Agnew!
